amendment.description: To delay or cancel new construction, purchasing, leasing, and renovation of Federal buildings and office space.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 797 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 797 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6808-6809; text: CR S6809) To delay or cancel new construction, purchasing, leasing, and renovation of Federal buildings and office space.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 797 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 738.
